Interface Numeric

All Known Subinterfaces:
IntVector, NaturalVector, RealVector, Vector
All Known Implementing Classes:
Complex, DeepColor, Fraction, IntMatrix, IntVector2, IntVector3, IntVector4, Matrix, MutableIntVector, MutableNaturalVector, MutableRealVector, MutableVector, NaturalVector2, NaturalVector3, NaturalVector4, Quaternion, RealMatrix, RealNumber, RealVector2, RealVector3, RealVector4, RGBColor, RichColor, Vector2, Vector3, Vector4, Vector5, Vertex
public interface Numeric
A mathematical number.

    • compare

      static int compare(@Nonnull Numeric n1, @Nonnull Numeric n2) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to compare two numbers as good as possible. This uses the signed squares of each number's double representation for efficiency.

      Even though this is faster than slowCompare(Numeric, Numeric), this is still relatively slow compared to using equals(Object) or Numbers.equals(double, double) (and its overloads).

      Parameters:
      n1 - The first number to compare
      n2 - The second number to compare
      Returns:
      0 if the values are equal, 1 if the first number's value is larger, -1 otherwise
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - When at least one of ths numbers does not have a single scalar representation
      See Also:
      • doubleValue2(Numeric)

    • slowCompare

      static int slowCompare(@Nonnull Numeric n1, @Nonnull Numeric n2) throws UnsupportedOperationException
      Attempts to compare two numbers as good as possible. This uses each number's double representation for accuracy.
      Parameters:
      n1 - The first number to compare
      n2 - The second number to compare
      Returns:
      0 if the values are equal, 1 if the first number's value is larger, -1 otherwise
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - When at least one of ths numbers does not have a single scalar representation
      See Also:
      • doubleValue2(Numeric)

    • doubleValue

      Returns:
      The double representation
      Throws:

      Returns:
